page.title: 14Attitudes
page.content: A group of young people compiled the following predictions for 100 years hence. (1) All chapels in the area will close. Congregations are dwindling now. (2) There will be no village school. (3) Cats and dogs will remain as household pets. (4) Horses will be used for pleasure only. (5) Fox hunting will die out. (6) Milking cows will not be out in fields but kept indoors permanently. (7) The cuckoo will still come every spring. (8) More minerals will be found in the land. (9) Hedges will disappear. (10) Rivers and streams will expand. (11) Hopefully the electricity will be put underground thus obliterating the ugly pylons. (12) The limestone quarry nearby will have disappeared and a better cleaner view of the coastline will be seen.
